alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 6:59AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Koochiching County through 730 AM CDT... At 659 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles north of Birchdale, to 10 miles south of Baudette, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Koochiching County, including the following locations... Indus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
